price: ការជំនុំជំរះ(អំពើ)របស់ពួកគេគឺស្ថិតលើម្ចាស់របស់ខ្ញុំ តែមួយគត់ ប្រសិនបើពួកអ្នកដឹង។
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
